mapper.sql: id, survey_id, agent_UUID, status, record, seat, created_at, creator, valid, task_id, task_status,start_time,end_time,call_lasts_time, review_status, review_msg, reviewer,checked,reviewer_name,work_num, in_valid_msg,username
mapper.select:
select
from zs_answer
status = 1 and agent_UUID = #{agent}
limit 1

select
from zs_answer where survey_id = #{id} limit #{rowNum}, 200

SELECT answer.id, answer.survey_id, answer.agent_UUID, answer.status, answer.seat, answer.created_at, answer.creator, answer.valid, cdrinfo.record_file as record FROM zs_answer answer LEFT JOIN zs_cdrinfo cdrinfo ON FIND_IN_SET(answer.agent_UUID, cdrinfo.uuids) > 0 WHERE answer.survey_id = #{id} AND answer.agent_UUID != '';

select
from zs_answer where status=1 and agent_UUID=#{agentUuid}

SELECT result.* FROM ( SELECT cdrinfo.id cdr_id, answer.id, answer.survey_id, answer.agent_UUID, answer.status, answer.record, answer.seat, answer.created_at, answer.creator, answer.valid, answer.task_id, answer.task_status,answer.start_time,answer.end_time,answer.call_lasts_time FROM zs_answer answer LEFT JOIN zs_cdrinfo cdrinfo ON cdrinfo.id = answer.agent_UUID WHERE answer.survey_id = #{surveyId} AND cdrinfo.id IS NOT NULL ) result ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 0, 10;
select CONCAT( ( SELECT min(created_at) FROM zs_answer WHERE STATUS = 1 AND survey_id = #{surveyId} ), ' - ', ( SELECT max(created_at) FROM zs_answer WHERE STATUS = 1 AND survey_id = #{surveyId} ) )
